statements: UPDATE website_traffic_data SET time_spent_on_page = 30 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE website_traffic_data SET user_agent = 'Mozilla Firefox' WHERE page_url = 'example.com' AND date_visited = '2022-01-01 12:00:00';
UPDATE website_traffic_data SET time_spent_on_page = 120 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE website_traffic_data SET page_url = 'www.example.com/newpage' , referrer_url = 'www.referrer.com', user_agent = 'Chrome' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE website_traffic_data SET visit_duration = 60 WHERE id = 1
UPDATE marketing_performance_data SET clicks = 100, impressions = 500 WHERE campaign_id = 2
UPDATE website_traffic_data SET visit_duration = 60, visitor_id = 12345 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE marketing_performance_data SET clicks = 100, impressions = 500 WHERE campaign_id = 1;
UPDATE traffic_data SET page_url='www.example.com/blog' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE website_performance SET error_code=404, load_time=3.5 WHERE page_url='www.example.com';
UPDATE traffic_data SET page_url='example.com/about' WHERE id=1001;
UPDATE search_queries SET timestamp='2022-01-01 10:00:00' WHERE query_id=2002;
UPDATE website_visits SET visitor_id = 3 WHERE visit_id = 1;
UPDATE pages SET page_title = 'New Title', page_category = 'Updated Category' WHERE page_id = 5;
UPDATE website_visits SET page_id = 3 WHERE visitor_id = 2;
UPDATE pages SET page_title = 'New Page Title', page_category = 'New Category' WHERE page_id = 5;
UPDATE website_visits SET page_url = 'new_page_url', visitor_ip = '192.168.1.1' WHERE visit_id = 100
UPDATE click_rates SET click_location = 'header', click_source = 'direct' WHERE click_id = 50
UPDATE website_visits SET visitor_ip='192.168.1.1', referrer_url='http://referrer1.com' WHERE visit_date='2022-09-15';
